citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:41 p.m. on
12-Dec-19.
I addition to waiting 50 minutes, I knocked on the residence door and called the phone number provided. But, no
responsible adult was available for inspection.
